name: Nervous Pong
description:
For 2 players. You must goal 11 points to win.  (You may have to click on the game before press Enter or Start)

Controls

    Xbox360 gamepad  

Joystick or D-pad = Move 

A or B or X or Y = Change orientation 

LT or LB = Left rotation 

RT or RB = Right rotation

Start = Pause

    Keyboard  (Player 1)

Z or W and S = Move 

Space = Change orientation 

Q or A = Left rotation 

D = Right rotation

Enter = Pause

    Keyboard  (Player 2)

Up and Down arrows = Move 

Shift/Maj = Change orientation 

Left arrow = Left rotation 

Right arrow = Right rotation

Enter = Pause

Credits :

Creator - Romain Pierson
Music (1) - Midnight Stories by Vincent Lanty
Music (2) - Focus by Chipzel
